messages.content: Think of the damage his right-wing government could do to our schools, our hospitals and to the lives of some of the most vulnerable in our community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Schools in York are amongst the worst funded in the country; York's local NHS has to operate with a £28 million deficit. Investment in our transport infrastructure lags far behind London and the South East.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's clear the only way to beat Boris Johnson and his Conservative Party is to vote Lib Dem in York Outer. It's going to be a close battle between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives.

issues.education: Schools in York are amongst the worst funded in the country.
issues.government: Think of the damage his right-wing government could do to our schools, our hospitals, and to the lives of some of the most vulnerable in our community.
issues.health: York's local NHS has to operate with a £28 million deficit.
issues.transport: Investment in our transport infrastructure lags far behind London and the South East.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats 3A, 14-16 Tadcaster Road, Dringhouses, York

examples: York's local NHS has to operate with a £28 million deficit.
Schools in York are amongst the worst funded in the country.
I'm angry about the impact of this Conservative Government.
Think of the damage his right-wing government could do to our schools, our hospitals and to the lives of some of the most vulnerable in our community.
Five more years of this will be a disaster.
The simple fact is that Jeremy Corbyn and the Labour Party aren't going to win in York Outer.
It's clear the only way to beat Boris Johnson and his Conservative Party is to vote Lib Dem in York Outer.
Schools in York are amongst the worst funded in the country.
York's local NHS has to operate with a £28 million deficit.
Investment in our transport infrastructure lags far behind London and the South East.
Five more years of this will be a disaster.
Five more years of this will be a disaster.
Boris Johnson will be a disaster if he is elected to be our Prime Minister for five more years.
I'm angry about the impact of this Conservative Government.
The simple fact is that Jeremy Corbyn and the Labour Party aren't going to win in York Outer.
Labour can't win - but the Lib Dems can.
Boris Johnson will be a disaster if he is elected to be our Prime Minister for five more years.
